name: Panos Spiros
story: Panos grew up in a small town in Greece and moved to the city to find work. He has been a diligent worker all his life, and has gained a reputation as someone who can always be counted on to get the job done. Despite his busy work schedule, he still finds time to volunteer at a local church and is a devout Christian. His marriage unfortunately ended in divorce, but he remains on good terms with his ex-wife and children.
